content: this is a legal case that started in the municipal court čakovec and is now in the county court varaždin the case has been ongoing for 2 years in 2014 a resolution was made regarding the coownership of a property in čakovec the coowners decided to dissolve the coownership through a civil partition the court ordered a public sale of the property and divided the proceeds among the coowners based on their coownership ratios the counterparty appealed the decision without stating legal grounds and requested the appellate court to amend the decision the firstinstance court dissolved the coownership and determined the value of the property the counterparty was ordered to reimburse the petitioner for partition costs the firstinstance court also established that the party representing the legal representatives would bear the legal costs while the common material costs would be borne proportionally by the coowners based on their coownership shares
